description: Demolish existing building. Redevelopment of site to provide a new public open space and erection of a four-storey building and single dwelling houses to provide 114no. residential units (mixture of 59no. houses and 55no. flats) with associated landscaping works, car parking, cycle storage, waste / refuse and amenity space. (Amended plans and additional or updated documents: accessible homes, street lighting, arboriculture, urban greening, biodiversity net gain, flood risk assessment, transport assessment, air quality, S106 contributions and fencing plan). (Summary).
site_name: Development At Sports Ground Rear Of Greenleafe Drive Brandville Gardens And

open_spaces_details.description: The site comprises a parcel of open space, previously used as Stratford Newtown Wesleyan Sports Ground. However, this site is vacant and inaccessible to the public.
open_spaces_details.open_space_type: Outdoor sports facilities incl. school playing fields
